data_structures

Class UnionFind

  • java.lang.Object
    • data_structures.UnionFind

  • public class UnionFind
extends java.lang.Object
    Union-Find structure is implemented in this class. It offers valuable data about the MST, for example, it can check if two vertices are included in the same tree.
